BIO

Hi! I am Luna, a self-taught junior web developer, with some experience in full stack. I am fueled by my passion for understanding how computers and the Internet work. I consider myself a "forever student", eager to both build on my academic foundations, and stay in tune with the latest technologies through continued professional development. Also, I am a very quick learner: I have been learning coding for about three months, and I already made my first full-stack website ;D

I desire to become multi-faceted and I cultivate a mindset to constantly upskill myself, and hope to learn to deliver results quickly with a toolkit that constitutes the most efficient tools in the industry, enabling smart and fast work.

My background in science and mathematics has taught me to work proactively and efficiently. I am capable of well-structured mindful work, both independently as well as in a team setting, and bear in mind to finish tasks on time.
